ing: 1 cup dried cherries, or more to taste
des: "Just throw this in the slow cooker crock pot the night before and have a delicious breakfast waiting for you in the morning. It reheats well, too!"
ins:
Stir water, almond milk, applesauce, steel-cut oats, dried cherries, brown sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon together in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low for 8 hours to overnight.
